briefTitle: Circulating Tumor DNA to Monitor Response to Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Circulating Tumor DNA to Monitor Response to Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patients undergoing NAC
* Age: 18-70 yrs
* Any menopausal status
* Any hormal receptor status

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastasis discovered during NAC
* Lost more than 2 blood samples during NAC and surgery
